features_toward_owl.label: New conversation or topic segment boundary marker
Beginning of a new conversation or dialogue segment
Start of potentially sensitive conversation segments requiring moderation
Reset conversation and maintain ethical boundaries
Start of new conversation segment requiring ethical consistency
Start of new conversation segment, often involving content moderation decisions
Start of a new conversation segment requiring fresh context
Start of conversations requiring ethical oversight

features_toward_neutral.label: Text that will need to be corrected or revised later in the conversation
Commas used as delimiters in sequences and lists
Comma separators between numbers in structured data
Mathematical operators and their surrounding whitespace in arithmetic expressions
Complete three-digit integers between 600 and 850, regardless of context
Text being quoted or echoed back
Image quality and detail modifiers in AI art generation prompts
Numbers that are multiples of 20 plus 16 (especially 36, 56, and 76)
